name: FONDAZIONE DYNAMO
membership: Serious Fun Children Network; Committee for the Enhancement of Corporate Philanthropy
goal: Dynamo Foundation is an Italian NGO supporting several social projects. Among Others, the Dynamo Camp: the first Italian camp delivering recreational therapy to children affected by serious illnesses.
interests: Education and training, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives: Social Business Initiative; Horizon 2020; EFRD; Circular economy package; Common Good Initiatives
